news.title: Your brain is unique – here's how it could be used as the ultimate security password
news.summary: Biometrics – technology that can recognise individuals based on physical and behavioural traits such as their faces, voices or fingerprints – are becoming increasingly important to combat financial fraud and security threats.

news.title: Forget intricate codes ansd fingertips recognition, brains are the ultimate passwords
